text: The Asp Explorer is a multirole ship manufactured by Lakon Spaceways, produced from 3300 to the present. It is a versatile medium ship with a decent cargo capacity of up to 130 tonnes, six weapon hardpoints, and a prominent cockpit canopy offering unobstructed views of the cosmos. Its low hull mass allows it to achieve higher speeds than most dedicated trading vessels, making it popular among pilots who want to engage in various activities, including exploration and combat.

The Asp Explorer has a hull mass of 280 tonnes, armour rating of 378 with hardness of 52, shields of 152 MJ, and a heat capacity of 272. It has a fuel capacity of 32 tonnes, a top speed of 254 m/s (default) or 290 m/s (upgraded), a boost speed of 345 m/s (default) or 395 m/s (upgraded), and an unladen jump range of 13.12 ly (default) or 38.19 ly (upgraded). It has a cargo capacity of 38 tonnes (default) or 130 tonnes (max).

The Asp Explorer has six weapon hardpoints: two medium hardpoints on the dorsal surface, two small hardpoints on the ventral surface on both sides of the cockpit, and two small hardpoints located directly beneath the cockpit. The medium and small hardpoints share a small field of fire directly ahead. Turrets in the medium hardpoints have firing arcs above the cockpit, while turrets in the small hardpoints have firing arcs below the cockpit.

The Asp Explorer's default outfitting includes four small hardpoints with Pulse Lasers (Class 1, Grade F), two medium hardpoints that are empty, and four utility mounts that are empty. It has a variety of internal compartments, including cargo racks, a shield generator, and a supercruise assist module. The default systems include lightweight alloys for the bulkhead, a power plant, thrusters, a frame shift drive, life support, a power distributor, sensors, and a fuel tank.
